name: Pide Directo
headline: One-stop-shop for restaurants to operate and grow their business.
description:
Pidedirecto is a restaurant management platform that optimizes operations, increases revenue, and enhances customer experience. Its comprehensive toolset includes point of sale, payment terminals, online ordering, delivery management, loyalty programs, and integrations with third-party services.

All for a reasonable fixed monthly fee, without eating up margins with hefty commissions and service charges.

founders.name: Ronni Samir Sulaka, Founder
founders.description:
Founder of Pidedirecto.mx - Enables local businesses such as restaurants, pharmacies, local grocery stores, flower shops, cake shops, and many more by building out their own branded website, integrating phone and social media orders, and helping them deliver their products in less than 30 minutes. While also providing partners key customer insights and marketing support.

All for a reasonable fixed monthly fee, without eating up margins with hefty commissions and service charges.

founders.name: Anders Steiner, Founder
founders.description: Worked with tech for 15 years. Founder and CTO of Pide Directo. Big fan of GitHub and contributing to Open Source.

generated_description:
**Pide Directo**: Revolutionizing Restaurant Management 

Founded in **2020** and nestled in the vibrant city of **Monterrey, Mexico**, Pide Directo emerged as a standout restaurant management platform, quickly gaining recognition as part of the prestigious **Y Combinator Batch S21**. The vision? To provide a **one-stop-shop for restaurants** to streamline operations and enhance growth.

At its core, Pide Directo offers a comprehensive suite of tools: think **point of sale systems**, **payment terminals**, **online ordering**, delivery management, and loyalty programs—perfectly integrated and all for a reasonable fixed monthly fee. This model is a breath of fresh air for restaurant owners, who have grown weary of hefty commission fees that eat into their margins. Instead of running on a cut of sales, Pide Directo partners with its clients, empowering them to focus on what they do best: serve amazing food.

So, what exactly does Pide Directo do? It optimizes delivery logistics, ensuring timely order fulfillment by connecting restaurants with available fleet providers like Rappi, Uber, and Didi. Thanks to its seamless integration of third-party services, restaurants can track orders in real-time, giving them and their customers peace of mind. And speaking of partnerships, Pide Directo is officially recognized as a **Top Tech Partner** by Rappi, enhancing its credibility and reach within the delivery sector.

With a solid team of **150 employees** and over **5,000 satisfied clients**, Pide Directo aims to establish itself as a go-to platform for restaurant optimization. Curious about their solutions? They offer personalized demos and detailed consultations via their [website](http://pidedirecto.mx).

In essence, Pide Directo is on a mission not just to support restaurant operations but to redefine how restaurants grow and thrive in a competitive marketplace. Their tagline summarizes their ethos: they’re more than a service; they’re a partner, committed to propelling your business forward.
